t: Check out this Amazon review of Broan-NuTone RVK1A Roof Vent Kit, Black
s: This item is built well and works as expected for a bathroom fan installation. Cutting the hole in the roof was the worst part of the install. The zip ties that came with this vent worked okay but a hose clamp would have let me feel more secure in a confined roof space.
